entry.title: [podfic] What Happens On Nereid.... by Mawiiish
entry.summary:
Author: xk_s_reads (xiaokuer_schmetterling)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 58Chapters: 3/5Kudos: 6

Summary: a bedtime (‚∏ù‚∏ù·¥ó_·¥ó‚∏ù‚∏ù) z z ê∞Å stories podfic summary: Bruce and Clark are kidnapped by aliens and taken to Nereid - their home planet. In order to save Bruce from becoming the aliens' concubine, Clark tells them that he's already spoken for. This leads to an elaborate act to make sure they'll survive long enough to escape. All they have to do is convince the aliens they're in love for a few days, how hard can it be? Bruce doesn‚Äôt even know where to begin. He‚Äôs still trying to figure out how they got into this mess in the first place. It shouldn‚Äôt have happened this way, he had a plan. They were following his plan, at least to some extent. There‚Äôs always some hiccups but nothing major. They were doing good. There is absolutely no reason it should‚Äôve gone this wrong.Oh wait, that‚Äôs right, it is completely and irrevocably Clark Kent‚Äôs fault. Series: Part 1 of What Happens On Nereid...

entry.summary:
Author: batling_out_of_hell

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,383Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 393

Summary: Bruce finds baby Jon-El in a pod that crash landed in his backyard. The Justice League warns him that Kryptonians are not to be messed with, that they're incredibly powerful, that they're conquerors. That little baby Jon may be a toddler, but so was a lion cub.Bruce doesn't care. A baby is a baby, and Jon is his baby now.The one thing he didn't count on, however, was the lion returning.

entry.title: The Phantom Robin
entry.summary:
Author: Scarletred1990

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,422Chapters: 29/?Kudos: 478

Summary: Danny wasn't a Fenton. He wasn't their original child, in fact, he was their nephew. A nephew they lied to. They thought they were helping him, but all it did was cause him to resent them. Cause him to run away. He needed to fix this mistake he unknowingly made.Dick wasn't a Wayne, but he liked pretending to be. It felt better than remembering that he was abandoned by someone he thought he could trust. Someone he thought would never leave his side. Someone who wasn't there for their deaths.Yet, they couldn't stay away from each other for too long. After all, they were two halves of the same whole.
